ygData.subject: Re: Dual wield vs using a shield (long)
ygData.msgSnippet: No, unfortunately it is either weapon(s) or instrument, never both.  that would probably make the class a little unbalanced.  one reason instruments enhance
ygData.messageBody:
No, unfortunately it is either weapon(s) or instrument, never both. that
would probably make the class a little unbalanced. one reason instruments
enhance the power of songs is because you have to sacrifice your weapon to
use them.

Shada

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Bob Stewart [mailto:bstewart@...]
> Sent: Thursday, June 24, 1999 12:57 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Dual wield vs using a shield (long)
>
>
> From: Bob Stewart <bstewart@...>
>
> At 03:54 PM 6/24/99 -0400, Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) wrote:
> >i guess i have not really put much thought into why, but i
> can say that i
> >have never used a shield past level 17. i guess i just
> assumed the dmg you
> >do with duel wield far outweighs the 10to15AC you can get
> with a shield.
> >and its just fun having two weapons =P
>
> With dual wield will I be able to wield a weapon and an
> instrument at the
> same time?
>
> Thrush
